chapter1.title: The Replicated Self
chapter1.description: Selfhood is not self-made, but shaped in subtle repetitions, negotiated glances, and quiet adjustments to what is expected.

artworks.title: Mirror
artworks.description: An interactive artwork that employs a random dithering algorithm to compress and reproduce the form of the spectator standing before the screen.

artworks.title: The Joy of Fish
artworks.description: Explores everyday sensory experiences through screen printing techniques, questioning the repetitiveness embedded in routine.

artworks.title: N Series
artworks.description: Part of a series exploring repetitive patterns and daily life rhythms.

artworks.title: Wild Grass
artworks.description: Captures the spirituality and timelessness found in nature's subtle details.

artworks.title: Predicament
artworks.description: Explores the relationship between natural decay and spiritual renewal.

artworks.title: Predicament II
artworks.description: Continuation of the Predicament series exploring life's spiritual dimensions.

artists.name: Sharleen Cu
artists.specialty: Acrylic, color pencil, wood and wire

artworks.title: In Good Company
artworks.medium: Acrylic, color pencil, wood and wire
artworks.description: Explores the complicated mess of identity as a Chinese-Filipino living in Australia through mixed media self-portraiture.

chapter2.title: The Rewilded Senses
chapter2.description: Even in the default disciplinary reality, feelings still find their way to nurturing the part of us that continues to listen beneath it all.

artworks.title: Null's Lamp
artworks.description: Through the skillful use of reflective color, this work creates a rich spatial atmosphere and guides human behavior and visual flow.

artworks.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
artworks.description: An experimental video composed of dot matrix colors containing hidden 3D imagery using autostereogram technique.

artworks.title: Myriad of Dust
artworks.description: The microscopic structure of a butterfly's wings revealed in entirely different forms under microscopic lens.

artists.name: Frank James Meuschke
artists.bio: Artist information from Frank James Meuschke

artworks.title: Touch The Sky
artworks.description: Expression of melancholy, memory, nature, and place using petroleum-based plastic filters.

artworks.title: Whitewater River
artworks.description: Part of the artist's exploration of ecologically significant sites at perceptual thresholds.

artworks.title: Fishing, Smith Point, New York
artworks.medium: Pigment Print on Hahnemuhle Photo Rag
artworks.description: Engages dialogue between nature, national identity, place and personal experience.

artworks.title: Mountain House, Aspen, Colorado
artworks.medium: Pigment Print on Hahnemuhle Photo Rag
artworks.description: Part of the "Aesthetics of Melancholy" series exploring nature and personal experience.

artists.name: Vivian Qiu
artists.specialty: Rice, embroidery thread, coffee grounds, grass, herbs, tea, grains, hemp yarns

artworks.title: We've Come A Long Way
artworks.medium: Rice, embroidery thread, coffee grounds, grass, herbs, tea, grains, hemp yarns
artworks.dimensions: Various sizes, 6 x 4 x 4 cm per object
artworks.description: Recreates ancient Chinese clay pots using rice and natural fibers, reconnecting with history and Chinese heritage.

artworks.title: Use What You've Got
artworks.medium: Rice, coffee grounds, grass, tea, sand, metal
artworks.description: Inspired by repurposed ceramic pot walls, exploring resourcefulness and cultural heritage.

artists.name: Qianxun Li
artists.specialty: Deconstructed umbrella frame, nylon filament, glass, UV-cured

artworks.title: Rain: The Apparent Threshold
artworks.medium: Deconstructed umbrella frame, nylon filament, glass, UV-cured
artworks.description: Reimagines the umbrella as a skeletal structure, exploring boundaries between shelter and exposure.

artworks.title: Raindrop
artworks.medium: Aluminum, UV Resin, Vegetable Oil, Steel Wire, Transparent Thread
artworks.description: Captures the instant of rain hitting metal, with droplets suspended on transparent threads.

artworks.title: After the Rain
artworks.medium: Aluminum, UV resin, vegetable oil, steel wire
artworks.description: Captures the quiet aftermath of rainfall, when droplets remain on metal surfaces.

artworks.title: World
artworks.medium: Aluminum, wood, UV glue, vegetable oil, plastic, handmade paper
artworks.description: Incorporates elements of light, shadow, and trees with movable leaves and embedded leaf fragments.

artworks.title: Water Between Fingers
artworks.description: Captures the sensation of water droplets slipping between fingers, symbolizing the flow of life.

artworks.title: Falling to Me
artworks.description: Explores themes of mysticism, trauma, and healing through cross-cultural experiences and intuitive artistic practice.

artworks.title: Firework Candy
artworks.description: Part of the artist's exploration of mysticism and healing through color and form.

artworks.title: Angel's Whisper
artworks.description: Explores spiritual themes and the artist's intuitive approach to healing through art.

artists.name: Bei Han
artists.specialty: Paper mounted on wood panel, natural mineral pigments, synthetic pigments, gold leaf

artworks.title: Echo
artworks.medium: Paper mounted on wood panel, natural mineral pigments, synthetic pigments, gold leaf
artworks.description: Connects natural symbols with the act of creation, evoking the viewer's sensory experience of the ocean's sound.

artists.name: Shiyin Li
artists.specialty: Digital tablet drawing + archival pigment print

artworks.title: Bird of Paradise
artworks.medium: Digital tablet drawing + archival pigment print
artworks.description: A magical story of children and a glowing bird during wartime, exploring themes of hope and rescue.

artworks.title: Damade Night
artworks.description: Celebrates the hidden beauty that emerges in darkness and the adaptability of life.

artworks.title: Santa Lucia Flower
artworks.description: Celebrates the fleeting nature of life through vibrant ceramic flowers with blue luster details.
